customer' reviews

Irina Ivanchenko
2 half marathons
I didn't know what to buy myself - I turned to the guys from RunSmart - they picked up a heart rate monitor that suited my goals and financial capabilities. After a while I decided to update the gadget - without hesitation I turned to the same place.

New targets - new gadget!

Thank RunSmart!
Ivan Semochki
1 half marathon
Cool thing is the heart rate monitor. Usually I ran without them. It turns out that I only did worse for myself. I bought a heart rate monitor and received a training session as a gift. We had the first training session with me, taught me how to use a new gadget. They also explained the basics of anatomy, made a training plan for the month ahead.

With them I prepared for my first half marathon! Thanks!!!
Yulia Dashkina
2 half marathons
For a long time I could not start running, because before that I started several times, but it became difficult and I quit. I heard from friends about RunSmart and running with heart rate control and decided to give it a try.

I called, the guys asked about my goals and picked up a very interesting option with a discount! Now I run and enjoy running! I have already run 2 half marathons and several shorter races and does not intend to stop!

Thanks!!!
